Reviews.Title: barely acceptable - low quality, both hard and software
Reviews.Author: S. Mayo

Reviews.Title: works great as basic indoor ip cam
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Lake "Mike Lake"

ProductInfo.Features:
AirLink101 SkyIPCam 250 Remote Network Camera General Features:
Connection: 10/100 Fast Ethernet LAN Camera Sensor: 1/3-color CMOS Camera Resolution: 640 x 480
Focal Length: 6.0 mm Aperture: 1.8 S/N Ratio: 57 dBm Video Format: Image Compression: MotionJPEG
Resolution: 10 fps @ 640 x 480 (VGA), 25 fps @ 320 x 240 (CIF), 30 fps @ 160 x 112 (QCIF)
Capable of still image captures, video recording, and e-mail notices
ProductInfo.Name: AirLink101 SkyIPCam AIC250 Remote Network Color Camera - Record Videos, Snapshots & View Live up to 16 Cameras!
